message.entry: Number of colors must equal number of vertices.
Number of colors must equal number of vertices or faces.
Number of alpha values must equal number of vertices.
Number of alpha values must equal number of vertices or faces.
The number of colors must be equal to number of vertices when MarkerFaceColor or MarkerEdgeColor is 'flat'.
The number of colors must be equal to number of vertices when MarkerFaceColor or MarkerEdgeColor is 'flat'.
Values in Faces must be between 1 and the number of vertices.
FaceVertexAlphaData must be specified when FaceAlpha is 'flat' or 'interp'.
Flat or interp true alpha is not supported when the FaceColor is interp indexed.
Size of VertexNormals must be equal to the size of Vertices when FaceLighting or EdgeLighting is 'gouraud'.
VertexNormals cannot be an empty array when FaceLighting or EdgeLighting is 'gouraud'.
Size of FaceNormals must be equal to the size of Faces when FaceLighting or EdgeLighting is 'flat'.
FaceNormals cannot be an empty array when FaceLighting or EdgeLighting is 'flat'.
Specify the coordinates as matrices of the same size or as vectors with the same number of elements.
{0} value must match the data type of the corresponding ruler. To specify categorical, datetime, or duration data, use the positional argument syntax.
